attributes.action: Stop the sale of fireworks to the general public
attributes.additional_details: On "mischief night" many fireworks were fired at buildings and vehicles; and just recently in Bootle, a set of fireworks were set off in a shop.
attributes.background: Too much anti-social behavoir is going around lately in regards to the use of fireworks as weapons. I would like to put my word across to the government that the sale of fireworks need to be permitted to event organisers only and follow suit of the Australian law.
